item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
Welcome to BigLedger! This guide will help you get started quickly.

Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you have:

  • An active BigLedger account
  • Basic understanding of blockchain concepts
  • Internet connection

First Steps

1. Account Setup

Create your BigLedger account:

  1. Visit BigLedger Platform
  2. Click “Sign Up”
  3. Follow the registration process
  4. Verify your email

2. Dashboard Overview

After logging in, you’ll see the main dashboard with:

  • Account overview
  • Recent transactions
  • Quick actions
  • Notifications

3. Basic Operations

Learn the fundamental operations:

  • Creating transactions
  • Viewing history
  • Managing settings

Next Steps

  • Explore more User Guides
  • Check out Developer Documentation
  • Review API Reference
